title: Mango Airline
summary: Launched in October 2006 , Mango Airlines was  the first airline to be known as a true low cost airline in South Africa.
body: Mango Airlines SOC Ltd, known as Mango, is a state-owned South African low-cost airline, founded in 2006 as a subsidiary of South African Airways, that operates domestic scheduled budget services.
highlights: Highest quality Airline service in South Africa

testimonials.text: I don't always travel, but when I do, I travel with Mango
testimonials.author: Jonathan Winters
